results.message: README.md is not needed in a skill — agents may load it into their context window, taking space from your actual task (Anthropic best practices: skills should only contain files that directly support agent functionality)
unknown directory: examples/ (contains 2 files) — agents using the standard skill structure won't discover these files; should this be references/ or assets/?
unknown directory: resources/ (contains 2 files) — agents using the standard skill structure won't discover these files; should this be references/ or assets/?
allowed-tools is a YAML list; the spec defines this as a space-delimited string — both are accepted, but a string is more portable across agent implementations
